label: uncl8281
comment: Code indicating the ownership of a means of transport.

values.label: Transport for the owner's account
values.comment: The owner of the transported goods is also the owner of the means of transport or rented it for this transport.

values.label: Transport for another account
values.comment: The owner of the transported goods does not own the means of transport or has not rented it for this transport.

values.label: Private transport
values.comment: A code indicating privately owned transport.
